Great game to play. Fun to kill time and play with friends. Great with mods for some custom models on weapons if they feel old, and just fun to play for classic CS fans.

CS:S IS somehow 1000000000000x better than CS:GO what the hell how am i gold nova master on cs:go and on cs:s iam GLOBAL ELITE I heard headshot x250 multikill x240 killing spree x30 megakill x150 ultrakill x40 i know that i might inflate these numbers considering my kills but it felt like it the narator said it but wow this game is CS:S > CS:GO 9800% Iam Sure bots better players better long quene times none execpt downloading the map etc but not 2-5min like in CS:GO custom sprays boom this game is the real deal
Every cs game is good would recomend
Lo que hace bueno a este juego es su comunidad. A pesar del tiempo, vale la pena jugar.
